channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Verify Access
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Verify Access

item.title: CVE-2021-29665|2024-09-17T00:21:32.420Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 20.07 is vulnerable to a stack based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking which could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2020-4499|2024-09-17T04:28:43.932Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager 9.0.7 and IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0 could allow an unauthorized public Oauth client to bypass some or all of the authentication checks and gain access to applications. IBM X-Force ID: 182216.

item.title: CVE-2021-20585|2024-09-17T00:15:52.591Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 20.07 could disclose sensitive information in HTTP server headers that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 199398.

item.title: CVE-2022-22465|2024-09-17T00:21:39.697Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance 10.0.0.0, 10.0.1.0, 10.0.2.0, and 10.0.3.0 could allow a local user to obtain elevated privileges due to improper access permissions. IBM X-Force ID: 225082.

item.title: CVE-2021-38957|2024-09-17T04:19:09.483Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify 10.0.0, 10.0.1.0, and 10.0.2.0 could disclose sensitive information due to hazardous input validation during QR code generation. IBM X-Force ID: 212040.

item.title: CVE-2024-35133|2024-08-29T16:39:43.913Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0 through 10.0.8 OIDC Provider could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim.

item.title: CVE-2023-30430|2024-08-02T14:21:44.771Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0 through 10.0.7.1 could allow a local user to obtain sensitive information from trace logs. IBM X-Force ID: 252183.

item.title: CVE-2024-31883|2024-08-02T01:59:50.071Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.7.1, under certain configurations, could allow an unauthenticated attacker to cause a denial of service due to asymmetric resource consumption. IBM X-Force ID: 287615.

item.title: CVE-2024-31883|2024-06-27T17:23:32.454Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.7.1, under certain configurations, could allow an unauthenticated attacker to cause a denial of service due to asymmetric resource consumption. IBM X-Force ID: 287615.

item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.7.1, under certain configurations, could allow an unauthenticated attacker to cause a denial of service due to asymmetric resource consumption. IBM X-Force ID: 287615.

item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0 through 10.0.7.1 could allow a local user to obtain sensitive information from trace logs. IBM X-Force ID: 252183.

item.title: CVE-2024-35133|2024-08-29T17:03:12.007Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0 through 10.0.8 OIDC Provider could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim.
